subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Sergio Mitre, starting in place of the injured Andy Pettitte, gave up five runs in a loss to the Royals. Mark Teixeira hit two homers, but Alex Rodriguez remained at 599.
snippet: Sergio Mitre, starting in place of the injured Andy Pettitte, gave up five runs in a loss to the Royals. Mark Teixeira hit two homers, but Alex Rodriguez remained at 599.
